title: Ethnic clashes continue in India’s Manipur despite army presence
description: Authorities had issued shoot-at-sight orders in 'extreme cases' in an effort to contain the violence.

title: Funerals held for some victims of Serbia shootings
description: Two mass shootings that happened just a day apart this week left 17 people dead and 21 wounded, many of them children.

title: Turkey to move its Sudan embassy after ambassador’s car hit
description: Turkey will move its embassy from Khartoum to Port Sudan after gunfire on ambassador's car, foreign minister says.

title: Gundogan brace against Leeds takes Man City four points clear
description: City move four points clear of Arsenal at the top of the Premier League after beating Leeds United 2-1.

title: A US civil case gives us, Syrians, a glimmer of hope
description: A new lawsuit against the Syrian regime filed in the US is an important step towards justice for Syria's disappeared.

title: King Charles III crowned as the UK blends tradition and change
description: Charles's second wife Camilla was also crowned queen with the Queen Mary's Crown in lavish event at Westminster Abbey.

title: Pro-Kremlin writer injured in car blast that killed his driver
description: The prominent nationalist writer Zakhar Prilepin is an ardent supporter of the Russia's invasion of Ukraine.

title: Head of UK anti-monarchy group arrested at coronation protest
description: Demonstrations against the monarchy take place in London as well as in Glasgow in Scotland and Cardiff in Wales.

title: Urawa beat Al Hilal to win third Asian Champions League
description: Japanese side win 2-1 on aggregate after beating Saudi Arabia's Al Hilal 1-0 courtesy of an own goal at Saitama Stadium.

title: Photos: The crowning of King Charles III
description: The coronation is the first in Britain in 70 years and only the second in history to be televised.

title: Rival Sudan factions meet in Saudi Arabia as pressure mounts
description: US-Saudi-led initiative in Jeddah is the first serious attempt to end fighting that has thrown Sudan into chaos.

title: Ukraine downs Russian hypersonic missile with US Patriot system
description: Air-launched missile can reach speeds of up to Mach 10 and is capable of carrying a nuclear warhead.

title: Israeli forces kill 2 Palestinians in the occupied West Bank
description: Israel's army claims the men were involved in a shooting attack in which an Israeli civilian was wounded.

title: Israel’s Automated Occupation: Hebron
description: How Israel’s use of AI-powered surveillance in Hebron has entrenched the Israeli government’s control over Palestinians.

title: Nothing to eat: Why is the world hungrier than ever?
description: Global food prices are falling but food insecurity is still on the rise across many countries. We find out why.

title: Robert Lacey: Pomp, ceremony and challenges for King Charles III
description: A renowned royal biographer discusses the challenges awaiting Britain's King Charles.

title: More than 50 aftershocks shake Japan as earthquake kills one
description: A magnitude 6.5 earthquake hit the central Ishikawa region on Friday leaving a man dead and more than 20 injured.

title: Syrians still fear building collapses three months on from quakes
description: Northwestern Syria is also in desparate need of aid, say locals and UN officials.

title: Will Ethiopia and Eritrea be dragged into Sudan’s complex war?
description: The countries have a long history of getting involved in each other's affairs, leading to fears of a regional crisis.

title: Iran executes Swedish-Iranian dual national: State media
description: Habib Farajollah Chaab was sentenced to death over role with separatist group alleged to have carried out deadly attack.

title: Ukraine says no sign of Russia’s Wagner force Bakhmut withdrawal
description: Ukraine military officials say Wagner fighters are being sent to Bakhmut to reinforce their positions, not withdraw.

title: Doha Diamond League: Sha’Carri Richardson, Chopra steal the show
description: India's Neeja Chopra overcomes windy conditions to win men's javelin as Richardson of the US stuns in women's 100m race.

title: Pakistan set to host trilateral dialogue with China, Afghanistan
description: The meeting is taking place following the Chinese and Afghan foreign ministers' arrival in Islamabad.

title: Russia-Ukraine war: List of key events, day 437
description: As the war enters its 437th day, we take a look at the main developments.

title: US high court halts execution of man who received ‘unfair’ trial
description: The Supreme Court put the execution of Richard Glossip indefinitely on hold in a ruling on Friday.
